profile:
At Hometurf Lawn Care, we have been treating the lawns of our loyal customers for over 30 years. As a family-owned and -operated business, we have grown by delivering lush, healthy, green lawns while using only the highest quality products applied by professional lawn care technicians. Let us help you make your lawn look its best this season!

Our season-long lawn care programs take the guess work out of which products to use and when. Applications are scheduled to be applied four to six weeks apart throughout the season for optimal turf care. We strive to ensure everything your lawn needs is included in our programs. No telemarketing or sales calls pushing unnecessary extras.

Our services include: lawn care programs, lawn maintenance programs, fertilizer, weed control, insect control, aeration, grass seeding, dethatching, top dressing, chinch bug control and grub control.

profile:
Have you worked with landscaping contractors before who rush through the job and leave a mess of your yard? Do you now struggle to trust someone to take care of your lawn?

We’re a team of dedicated landscaping professionals who are well-known for getting any landscaping project done right, the first time around. We’re passionate about helping homeowners and business owners reach their landscaping goals and we take pride in our ability to provide high-quality services at an affordable price.
Since opening our doors in 2018, we’ve been able to expand our service areas all thanks to our trusted customers who rely on us as their long-term landscaping partner. If you live in Rockwood, Guelph, or the KW area, give us a call or request a free quote to discuss all your landscaping needs and how we can help you accomplish them.

We offer services such as:
Design
Build
Maintenance
Snow Removal

And more!

Check us out here:

www.instagram.com/riverwood_landscape
https://www.facebook.com/RiverwoodLandscape/
